group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry!
I didn't mean to do it... It was just@a sudden impulse...

group_1.textRight: That's what they all say.

group_1.textLeft: Please...! Please, anything but the police...!

group_1.textRight: Sure, we'll let you off the hook this time!@Because I'm no demon, lol.
But, you better watch out.
Because we've been photographing the crimes@we busted, FYI.
Well, we'll only forgive you this once, so don't@make any more mistakes, got it?
If you get it, then beat it.

group_1.textLeft: P-please excuse me...!
Heh heh, another case closed.
I feel like getting high today,@eating victory sweets.

group_1.textRight: Do you have to say it like that? People are@going to get the wrong idea...
Oh, this is your bag, isn't it?

group_1.textLeft: Uh, yes.

group_1.textRight: Be careful, okay?
Things have been strange in Takarazaki lately.@A lot of small-time crimes have been taking place.

group_1.textLeft: O-okay, got it.

group_1.textRight: By the way, can I ask you for a favor?

group_1.textLeft: What is it...?

group_1.textRight: Will you take a selfie with me?

group_1.textLeft: Selfie...?

group_1.textRight: I've been promoting activities like this@on social media.
I want everyone to know that I stand against@evil in the world.
So, if it doesn't bother you, then please!

group_1.textLeft: W-well...
Hagumun... It's dangerous to put your face@on the Internet...
And it's totally obvious you haven't got any@make-up on, Hagurin.
But you're a cutie, so maybe this is your chance@to go viral?

group_1.textRight: Please don't tease me...

group_1.textLeft: Umm, well, as long as you're okay with me@hiding my face...

group_1.textRight: Of course, thank you!
Oh, this is my social media account! You can@follow me if you want, lmao.

group_1.textLeft: Awawawa...a-alright...
She...took a quick photo, and just disappeared...
Their names were Mitsune and Jun, right?@They were pretty lively people...

group_1.textRight: Yeah, they were kind of like Himena.

group_1.textLeft: Eh, are you two for real?

group_1.textRight: Huh, am I wrong?

group_1.textLeft: From this cutie's point of view, that one girl@was just playing a character.
She's trying hard, but it felt like she was just@forcing herself, y'know?

group_1.textRight: You think so? I didn't see it that way...

group_1.textLeft: Ah... Hagumun...!

group_1.textRight: I know, this magic is...

group_1.textCenter: Miyabi, Azumi, you finally showed up...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][chara:103001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]...?!

group_1.textRight: I-instructor, it's been a while...!

group_1.textLeft: It's quite unreasonable to be late when you're@the ones who called me.

group_1.textRight: She's right, she's right! I agree with Lady San!
"Lady San"? So, you're that instructor chick?
San Kagura plus Miyuri Yukari?

group_1.textLeft: You're the one coming to me for a favor, yet you@don't even address me with proper respect?
Rude! So rude!

group_1.textRight: Toootally no idea what you're talking aboutâ˜…
Hey, Himena...!

group_1.textLeft: This cutie is here to be on top of you all.
Why should I get down on my knees and beg?
I mean, what's with all this demonic pressure@right from the very first meeting?
...[wait:0.5][chara:103101:lipSynch_1]I don't dislike that attitude.
You've gotten yourselves a fine catch, Miyabi, Azumi.

group_1.textRight: We didn't catch her, though...
Yes... It's more like she caught us...

group_1.textLeft: But even so, your clumsy and weak activities@were responsible for your encounter.
Look upon it as a fruit of your efforts.

group_1.textRight: O-okay...!
Lady San, Lady San! What will we do, then?

group_1.textLeft: I want them to explain their situation, so let's@show them to the community center.
I heard that they want me to join the Neo-Magius.
But that's not something that I can suddenly@agree to.

group_1.textRight: Understood!
Then let me show you guys around!
